original_text: Instead, you must grow as believers in our Lord Jesus Christ, who saves us. Continue to know him better and better. He will be kind to you and he will help you more and more. We praise him as he deserves! He is great now and he will be great for ever!
korean_text: 오직 우리 주 곧 구주 예수 그리스도의 은혜와 그를 아는 지식에서 자라 가라 영광이 이제와 영원한 날까지 그에게 있을지어다3)

sentences.original_text: Instead, you must grow as believers
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 너희는 믿는 자로서 자라나야 한다

sentences.original_text: Continue to know him better and better
He will be kind to you
and he will help you more and more
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 너희를 점점 더 도와주실 것이다

sentences.original_text: We praise him as he deserves
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그가 마땅히 받으실 찬양을 그에게 드린다

sentences.original_text: and he will be great for ever
